app.title: Handy
app.subtitle: Free, offline, open source speech-to-text tool

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the language for speech recognition. Auto will automatically determine the language, while selecting a specific language can improve accuracy for that language.
language.unsupported_description: Parakeet model automatically detects the language. No manual selection is needed.

whisper.title: Whisper.cpp
whisper.description: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition model
whisper.body: Handy uses Whisper.cpp for fast, local speech-to-text processing. Thanks to the amazing work by Georgi Gerganov and contributors.

history.empty: No transcriptions yet. Start recording to build your history!

errors.delete_failed: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.

paste_method.title: Paste method
paste_method.description: Clipboard (Ctrl/Cmd+V) pastes by simulating the keyboard shortcut. Direct uses system input methods when possible, otherwise it types characters one by one.

clipboard_handling.title: Clipboard handling
clipboard_handling.description: Choose how Handy manages your clipboard after a transcription is pasted.

sound_picker.title: Sound theme
sound_picker.description: Select the sounds played when recording starts and stops.
sound_picker.preview: Preview sound theme (plays start then stop)

word_correction_threshold.label: Word correction threshold
word_correction_threshold.description: Controls how aggressively custom words are applied. Lower values mean fewer corrections; higher values mean more corrections. Range: 0 (least aggressive) to 1 (most aggressive).

history_limit.title: History limit
history_limit.description: Maximum number of transcription entries to keep in history.

model_unload_timeout.title: Unload model
model_unload_timeout.description: Automatically free GPU/CPU memory when the model hasn't been used for the specified time.

always_on_microphone.label: Always-on microphone
always_on_microphone.description: Keep the microphone active for low-latency recording. This may prevent your computer from sleeping.

mute_while_recording.label: Mute while recording
mute_while_recording.description: Automatically mute system sound output during recording and restore it afterwards.
